q: Barack Obama !( CNN)-- Former Secretary of State Colin Powell announced Sunday that he will be voting for Barack Obama , citing the Democrat's`` ability to inspire'' and the`` inclusive nature of his campaign.'' Sen. Joe Lieberman think he is a transformational figure, he is a new generation coming onto the world stage, onto the American stage, and for that reason Sen. Joe Lieberman 'll be voting for Barack Obama , Colin Powell said on NBC's`` Meet the Press.'' Mr David Cameron said in a statement: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my Director of Communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so.`` Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the Government.
